committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Compensation and Employee Benefits

official_title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide higher rates of basic pay for Federal employees within certain geographic areas.

summary.text: Provides for higher rates of basic pay (108 percent of otherwise applicable rates) for Federal employees within: (1) the Massachusetts-New Hampshire consolidated metropolitan statistical areas of Boston-Lawrence-Salem and Providence-Pawtucket-Fall River; (2) the Massachusetts metropolitan statistical areas of New Bedford and Worcester; and (3) any remaining parts of Bristol County, Massachusetts.

titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide higher rates of basic pay for Federal employees within certain geographic areas.
